entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:07 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets changing to ice pellets near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
